name: Our Endless Emperor
description:
Cover art by Umberto "MrHate8" Tonella.

Our Endless Emperor is an all digital text-adventure game inspired by works such as Fabled Lands and Lone Wolf.

You will incarnate under one of the three kingdoms of a cursed land. Find your way to glory and bring peace to the three kings and gain court hearing for the endless emperor.

Will you slay the emperor? Replace him? Or become one with the universe? The royalties that decided to rule this land aren't the only ancient entities in existence. A blessing and a curse of an unknown teethed monster revives you in a different kingdom every time death embraces you.

Note: the game is a short prototype, intended for mobile. On PC the UI may be off.

For my fellow italiani:
Ho scritto un piccolo articolo su OEE sul mio profilo Behance.
